com.asoroka.sidora.csvmetadata.statistics

Class CsvScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.collect.UnmodifiableIterator<T>
      • com.google.common.collect.AbstractIterator<org.apache.commons.csv.CSVRecord>
        • com.asoroka.sidora.csvmetadata.statistics.CsvScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterator<org.apache.commons.csv.CSVRecord>

    public class CsvScanner
extends com.google.common.collect.AbstractIterator<org.apache.commons.csv.CSVRecord>
    The heart of statistical workflow. Handed a CSVParser, this class will scan through it and supply the values of fields to a "row" of DataTypeHeuristic strategies cloned from the configured choice.
    Author:
    ajs6f

        public void scan(int limit)
        Scan rows in our CSV up to a limit.
        Parameters:
        limit - The number of rows to scan, 0 for all rows.

        public List<DataTypeHeuristic<?>> getStrategies()
        Use this to recover and interrogate the strategy instances used in scanning.
